title: Analyzing the impact of remittance, FDI and inflation rate on GDP: A comparative study of Bangladesh, Pakistan and Sri-Lanka using VAR and BEKK-GARCH approach
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Fariea Nazim Jui, Md. Jamal Hossain, Anwesha Das, Nazia Sultana, Md. Kamrul Islam
